materials.Name: Oak Lumber
materials.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
materials.Description2: Premium oak lumber, meticulously processed through sawing, planing, milling, drilling, and polishing for exceptional quality.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Oak Lumber
lifeSkillSource.Des: Premium oak lumber, meticulously processed through sawing, planing, milling, drilling, and polishing for exceptional quality.

materials.Name: Oak Timber
materials.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
materials.Description2: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as oak timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

materials.Name: Cobalt-Iron Ingot
materials.Description: A cast metallurgical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Cobalt-Iron Ingot
lifeSkillSource.Des: A cast metallurgical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.

materials.Name: Cobalt-Iron Ore
materials.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Baru ore is commonly found in the core module sector. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru Rich Ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Baru ore is commonly found along the Thunder Cliff Trail. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru pure ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

materials.Name: Iron Ore
materials.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Baru ore is commonly found within the Towering Ruin. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru Ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Baru ore is commonly found in the core module sector. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru Rich Ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Baru ore is commonly found along the Thunder Cliff Trail. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru pure ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

materials.Name: Brass Ring
materials.Description: A cast metallurgical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Brass Ring*4
lifeSkillSource.Des: A cast metallurgical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.

materials.Name: Brass Ingot
materials.Description: A cast metallurgical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Brass Ingot
lifeSkillSource.Des: A cast metallurgical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.

materials.Name: Copper Ore
materials.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
materials.Description2: A copper ore of relatively high purity.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Azte ore is commonly found near the Old Kanamia Tribe. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Azte ore is commonly found on the floating isle at the center of the canyon. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Rich Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Azte ore is commonly found on the north side of Rotgate Courtyard. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Pure Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Stokes Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Stokes ore is commonly found along the Seachime Cliff Trail. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Stokes Rich Ore, which is used to craft Buri Mech Shard.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Stokes Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Stokes ore is commonly found in the forest caves to the south. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Stokes pure ore, which is used to craft Buri Mech Shard.

materials.Name: Zinc Ore
materials.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Luna ore is commonly found near the Scout Lookout Post. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Luna ore is also commonly found around Windwhisper Dome. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Rich Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Luna ore is commonly found on the northern edge of the forest. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Pure Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Hand-Spun Yarn
materials.Description: A flax-spun material utilized in woven fabrications,
materials.Description2: Flax-spun thread processed using a more proficient technique.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Hand-Spun Yarn*3
lifeSkillSource.Des: Flax-spun thread processed using a more proficient technique.

materials.Name: Cotton
materials.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
materials.Description2: Cotton-derived fibers serve as a vital raw material in the weaving profession.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Asteria Cotton
lifeSkillSource.Des: Found in the southern meadows of Minsterhorn. Produces high-quality cotton loved by the villagers.

materials.Name: Heavy Alloy Shard
materials.Description: After collecting enough Heavy Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 60 Epic gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
materials.Description2: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
